articles.title: Mexico transfers 26 cartel figures wanted by US authorities in deal with Trump administration - AP News
articles.description: Mexico is sending 26 high-ranking cartel figures to the United States in the latest major deal with the Trump administration. American authorities are ratcheting up pressure on criminal networks sending drugs across the border. Those being handed over to U.S.…
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) Mexico sent 26 high-ranking cartel figures to the United States Tuesday in the latest major deal with the Trump administration as American authorities ratchet up pressure on criminal … [+3381 chars]

articles.author: Dante Motley, Lily Kepner
articles.title: Austin police ID suspect, victims in Target shooting that left 3 dead - Austin American-Statesman
articles.description: Austin police named Ethan Nieneker as the suspect in a North Austin Target shooting that killed three, including a child; he faces capital murder charges.
articles.content:
Police work at the scene of a shooting at Target on Research Parkway in Austin, Monday, Aug. 11, 2025.
Jay Janner/Austin American-Statesman
